item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:

Mezcal is a new(ish!) Mexican restaurant in New Haven offering authentic Mexican food as well as fantastic margaritas and Mexican beers. We had very fun happy hours in December and March, and it seems like the perfect time to go back. (Also I have a really selfish reason.... I've had a great shrimp dish there before, and I've been craving it all week...)

The owner of Mezcal, Ricardo, is offering to extend the happy hour specials the whole time we're there, just for us:

** ALL BEER $2.50
** $3 House Margaritas
** 1/3 off all other margaritas

The restaurant is open until 9:30 on Monday nights.

Contact is Devorah (203) 314-4329 (Yes, it really is me - tee hee I accidentally sent out the anouncement email while Eric was still signed onto his account on the computer)

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.

***Bring a friend***
